ANDS-Grants.description: This project explores the security dynamics between Afghanistan and its neighbours in Central Asia. It provides new insights into how these neighbours; Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan manage threats and tensions in the region especially after NATO's substantial combat withdrawal from Afghanistan.
ANDS-Grants.title: Discovery Projects - Grant ID: DP130104461
